[[inst_hl_prf_a]]
==== HL.PRF.A

*Syntax:* hl.prf.a{.l1,.l2,.l3} [SrcL, SrcR<{.sw,.uw,.neg}><<<shamt>], ->{t, u, Rd}

*Description:* Long (48-bit) instruction encoding.

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_hl_prf_a.svg[HL.PRF.A encoding,width=800]

*Uop-Class:* LDA

*Compression:* HL48 (len=48)
